alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 6:16AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Comanche, south central Jackson, south central Kiowa, Tillman, east central Foard and central Wilbarger Counties through 645 AM CST... At 616 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Tipton to 4 miles northeast of Vernon to 4 miles east of Thalia. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Frederick, Tipton, Indiahoma, Davidson, Manitou, Hollister, Thalia, Harrold, Lockett, Fargo, Oklaunion, Rayland, and southern Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
